name: Castle Defense (Ray C. Rivera Morales)
description:
It is a strategy game where you have to take care of the castle and defend it from enemies and in the last levels there are multiple castles.

It is played practically with the click where you can also make improvements to the towers such as increasing the range of the towers, making the enemy a little slow when walking and more. I post this because they are game courses made in the course and I would like to share them with you and let them know me.
